description.main: The first edition of the AKAI Code hackathon organized by AKAI - Academic Web Application Research Group - takes place at the Pozna≈Ñ University of Technology.
description.idea: The idea of an event is simple! You code an application related to the topic within 24 hours, and then the jury decides which team will win.
description.categories: There are three categories to compete in - Best Idea, Best Prototype and Best use of technology. What's the topic? You'll find out soon!

about.title: About us
paragraphs: The first edition of the AKAI Code hackathon organized by AKAI - Akademickie Ko≈Ço Aplikacji Internetowych - takes place at the Pozna≈Ñ University of Technology.
The idea of an event is simple! You code an application related to the topic within 24 hours and then the jury decides which team will win.
There are three categories to compete in - Best Idea, Best Prototype and Best use of technology. What's the topic? You'll find out soon!
